pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Set Pareto Heterogeneity Analysis of Time-Course Gene Expression Data // Pareto front based statistical tool for detecting heterogeneity in gene sets and biological modules from time-course data. Details about this method are described in Gu, J., et al. (2017) doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btx348: Phantom: investigating heterogeneous gene sets in time-course data.
